column2: or La Villa del Rosario is a town of Venezuela in the Zulia State.

column1: It is located about sixty miles southwest of Maracaibo
column2: the State Capital. La Villa del Rosario is the capital of Rosario de Perijá Municipality. It has about 120.000 inhabitants(2007). Its economy is based on cattle-raising
column3: agriculture and milk production. It is said that this municipality is the first milk producer in Venezuela.
